Question: Where are the people hanging out?

Reference Answer: 4

Video ID: 2868301160

Original program:

```
TIME=FLAG(begin=None,middle=None,end=None)
ANSWERS0=VQA(video=VIDEO,question="Where are the people hanging out?")
```
Program:

```
TIME=FLAG(begin=None,middle=None,end=None)
ANSWERS0=VIDQA(video=VIDEO,question="Where are the people hanging out?")
SELECTED=SELECT(question="Where are the people hanging out?",information=ANSWERS0,choices=CHOICES)
```

This person approaches the group and interacts with the man in the light blue shirt, possibly handing over or exchanging an item. The man in the dark suit continues to observe the interaction closely.

The man in the light blue shirt then turns away from the group, seemingly walking towards another part of the golf course. The man in the dark suit follows him, still holding his golf club. The man in the white shirt and the man in the dark jacket remain in their positions, watching the interaction unfold.
